context.p: When you're done with processing your photo, you can export your photo to another file. retains your original file and writes the processed photo into a new file.

supports the following formats among other formats.
JPEGJPEG
PDFPDF
TIFFTIFF
PNGPNG
The default format is JPEG, but you can set other formats in the lighttable view under format options on the right pane of the view.
Exporting consists of a single step.

step.cmd: Press Ctrl+e to export your photo.
step.stepresult: During the exportexport procedure, you see the path of your export file on the screen.
